greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 0 of triangular matrix A102220, which equals [2*I - A008459]^(-1).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..248
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n-1} C(n, k)^2*a(k) for n>0, with a(0)=1.
mathematica: m = 20; CoefficientList[1/(2 - BesselI[0, 2 Sqrt[x]]) + O[x]^m, x] Range[0, m - 1]!^2 (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 11 2019, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ *)
b[n_] := b[n] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[b[n-i] Binomial[n, i]/i!, {i, 1, n}]];
a /@ Range[0, 20] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 03 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Dec 31 2004
ext: Content moved from A192723 to this sequence by _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 11 2019
